title: Watch Face GYS
summary: Interactive, custom watch face menu, background colors and more other options.

description: Watch face (GYS - Gray + Yellow + Sport) for smartwatches with:- steps counter;- battery level(watch/smartphone);- smartphone state info (Vibro; WiFi/Data connection);- missed calls and SMS counters;- launcher apps from smartwatch on smartphone; - built-in calendar;- stopwatch with tachymeter;- steps-B counter;- second time (GMT timelines);- custom background colors (gradient, 2 colors);- custom watch hands;Working fine on oldest and newest models on any screen (round/square).Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.Configuration supported languages- English- Français- Deutsch- Українська- Русский- 中文 （繁體）Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
descriptionHTML:
Watch face (GYS - Gray + Yellow + Sport) for smartwatches with:
- steps counter;
- battery level(watch/smartphone);
- smartphone state info (Vibro; WiFi/Data connection);
- missed calls and SMS counters;
- launcher apps from smartwatch on smartphone;
- built-in calendar;
- stopwatch with tachymeter;
- steps-B counter;
- second time (GMT timelines);
- custom background colors (gradient, 2 colors);
- custom watch hands;

Working fine on oldest and newest models on any screen (round/square).
Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.

Configuration supported languages
- English
- Français
- Deutsch
- Українська
- Русский
- 中文 （繁體）

Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
comments: Crashes. Will not load on to watch. Will not load. Burns up watch battery and unable to set or load.
recentChanges: - new hour marks (3 types for yellow and white colors);
